info.title: BalatroBot API
info.description: JSON-RPC 2.0 API for Balatro bot development. This API allows external clients to control the Balatro game, query game state, and execute actions through an HTTP server.

servers.name: Local
servers.description: Local HTTP server for Balatro game communication

methods.name: rpc.discover
methods.summary: Returns the OpenRPC schema for this service
methods.description: Service discovery method that returns the OpenRPC specification document describing this JSON-RPC API.

methods.name: add
methods.summary: Add a new card to the game
methods.description: Add a new card to the game (joker, consumable, voucher, or playing card). Playing cards use SUIT_RANK format (e.g., H_A for Ace of Hearts).

params.name: key
params.description: Card key. Format: jokers (j_*), consumables (c_*), vouchers (v_*), or playing cards (SUIT_RANK like H_A, D_K, C_2, S_T)

params.name: seal
params.description: Seal type for playing cards only

params.name: edition
params.description: Edition type. NEGATIVE only valid for consumables; jokers and playing cards accept all editions. Not valid for vouchers.

params.name: enhancement
params.description: Enhancement type for playing cards only

params.name: eternal
params.description: If true, card cannot be sold or destroyed (jokers only)

params.name: perishable
params.description: Number of rounds before card perishes (must be >= 1, jokers only)

params.name: rental
params.description: If true, card costs $1 per round (jokers only)

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state after card is added

methods.name: buy
methods.summary: Buy a card from the shop
methods.description: Buy a card, voucher, or pack from the shop. Must provide exactly one of: card, voucher, or pack.

params.name: card
params.description: 0-based index of card to buy from shop

params.name: voucher
params.description: 0-based index of voucher to buy

params.name: pack
params.description: 0-based index of pack to buy

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state after purchase

methods.name: cash_out
methods.summary: Cash out and collect round rewards
methods.description: Cash out and collect round rewards, transitioning to the shop phase.

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state after transitioning to shop

methods.name: discard
methods.description: Discard specified cards from the hand. Card indices are 0-based.

params.name: cards
params.description: 0-based indices of cards to discard (non-empty array)

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state after discard and hand redraw

methods.name: gamestate
methods.description: Get the complete current game state. Works in any game state.

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete current game state

methods.name: health
methods.description: Health check endpoint for connection testing. Always succeeds and works in any game state.

result.name: health
result.description: Health check response

methods.name: load
methods.summary: Load a saved run state from a file
methods.description: Load a previously saved run state from a file. The file must be a valid Balatro save file.

params.name: path
params.description: File path to the save file

result.name: result
result.description: Load operation result

methods.name: menu
methods.description: Return to the main menu from any game state.

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state (state will be MENU)

methods.name: next_round
methods.summary: Leave the shop and advance to blind selection
methods.description: Leave the shop and advance to the blind selection phase.

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state (state will be BLIND_SELECT)

methods.name: play
methods.description: Play specified cards from the hand. Card indices are 0-based.

params.name: cards
params.description: 0-based indices of cards to play (non-empty array)

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state after playing cards. State may be ROUND_EVAL, SELECTING_HAND, or GAME_OVER.

methods.name: rearrange
methods.summary: Rearrange cards in hand, jokers, or consumables
methods.description: Rearrange cards by providing a new ordering. Must provide exactly one of: hand, jokers, or consumables. The array must be a valid permutation of all current indices.

params.name: hand
params.description: 0-based indices representing new order of cards in hand

params.name: jokers
params.description: 0-based indices representing new order of jokers

params.name: consumables
params.description: 0-based indices representing new order of consumables

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state after rearrangement

methods.name: reroll
methods.description: Reroll to update the cards in the shop area. Costs money.

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state after reroll

methods.name: save
methods.summary: Save the current run state to a file
methods.description: Save the current run state to a file. Only works during an active run.

params.name: path
params.description: File path for the save file

result.name: result
result.description: Save operation result

methods.name: screenshot
methods.summary: Take a screenshot of the current game state
methods.description: Take a screenshot of the current game state and save it as PNG format.

params.name: path
params.description: File path for the screenshot file (PNG format)

result.name: result
result.description: Screenshot operation result

methods.name: select
methods.description: Select the current blind to begin the round.

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state (state will be SELECTING_HAND)

methods.name: sell
methods.description: Sell a joker or consumable from player inventory. Must provide exactly one of: joker or consumable.

params.name: joker
params.description: 0-based index of joker to sell

params.name: consumable
params.description: 0-based index of consumable to sell

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state after sale

methods.name: set
methods.description: Set one or more in-game values. Must provide at least one field. Only works during an active run.

params.name: money
params.description: New money amount (must be >= 0)

params.name: chips
params.description: New chips amount (must be >= 0)

params.name: ante
params.description: New ante number (must be >= 0)

params.name: round
params.description: New round number (must be >= 0)

params.name: hands
params.description: New number of hands left (must be >= 0)

params.name: discards
params.description: New number of discards left (must be >= 0)

params.name: shop
params.description: If true, re-stock shop with new items (only in SHOP state)

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state after setting values

methods.name: skip
methods.description: Skip the current blind (Small or Big only, cannot skip Boss blind).

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state after skipping

methods.name: start
methods.description: Start a new game run with specified deck and stake.

params.name: deck
params.description: Deck to use for the run

params.name: stake
params.description: Stake level for the run

params.name: seed
params.description: Optional seed for the run

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state (state will be BLIND_SELECT)

methods.name: use
methods.description: Use a consumable card with optional target cards. Some consumables require card selection.

params.name: consumable
params.description: 0-based index of consumable to use

params.name: cards
params.description: 0-based indices of cards to target (required for some consumables)

result.name: gamestate
result.description: Complete game state after using consumable

game-control.name: game-control
game-control.description: Game lifecycle control (start, menu, load, save)

cards.name: cards
cards.description: Card manipulation (play, discard, rearrange, use, add)

won.description: Whether the game has been won

cards.description: Cards remaining in deck (available during run)

pack.description: Currently open pack (available during pack opening phase)

packs.description: Booster packs area (available during shop phase)

level.description: Level of the hand in the current run

chips.description: Current chip value for this hand

mult.description: Current multiplier value for this hand

played.description: Total number of times this hand has been played

played_this_round.description: Number of times this hand has been played this round

example.description: Example cards showing what makes this hand

hands_left.description: Number of hands remaining in this round

hands_played.description: Number of hands played in this round

discards_left.description: Number of discards remaining in this round

discards_used.description: Number of discards used in this round

reroll_cost.description: Current cost to reroll the shop

chips.description: Current chips scored in this round

name.description: Name of the blind (e.g., 'Small', 'Big' or the Boss name)

score.description: Score requirement to beat this blind

tag_name.description: Name of the tag associated with this blind (Small/Big only)

tag_effect.description: Description of the tag's effect (Small/Big only)

Area.description: Card area (jokers, consumables, hand, shop, etc.)

count.description: Current number of cards in this area

limit.description: Maximum number of cards allowed in this area

highlighted_limit.description: Maximum number of cards that can be highlighted (hand area only)

cards.description: Array of cards in this area

effect.description: Description of the card's effect (from UI)

edition.description: Edition type (jokers, playing cards, and NEGATIVE consumables)

eternal.description: If true, card cannot be sold or destroyed (jokers only)

perishable.description: Number of rounds remaining (only if > 0, jokers only)

rental.description: If true, card costs money at end of round (jokers only)

debuff.description: If true, card is debuffed and won't score

hidden.description: If true, card is face down

highlight.description: If true, card is currently highlighted

buy.description: Buy price of the card (if in shop)

PathResult.description: Result for file operations (save, load, screenshot)

Previously skipped blind
The Fool: Creates the last Tarot or Planet card used during this run
The Magician: Enhances 2 selected cards to Lucky Cards
The High Priestess: Creates up to 2 random Planet cards
The Empress: Enhances 2 selected cards to Mult Cards
The Emperor: Creates up to 2 random Tarot cards
The Hierophant: Enhances 2 selected cards to Bonus Cards
The Lovers: Enhances 1 selected card into a Wild Card
The Chariot: Enhances 1 selected card into a Steel Card
Justice: Enhances 1 selected card into a Glass Card
The Hermit: Doubles money (Max of $20)
The Wheel of Fortune: 1 in 4 chance to add edition to a random Joker
Strength: Increases rank of up to 2 selected cards by 1
The Hanged Man: Destroys up to 2 selected cards
Death: Select 2 cards, convert the left card into the right card
Temperance: Gives the total sell value of all current Jokers (Max $50)
The Devil: Enhances 1 selected card into a Gold Card
The Tower: Enhances 1 selected card into a Stone Card
The Star: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Diamonds
The Moon: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Clubs
The Sun: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Hearts
Judgement: Creates a random Joker card
The World: Converts up to 3 selected cards to Spades
Mercury: Upgrades Pair (+1 Mult, +15 Chips)
Venus: Upgrades Three of a Kind (+2 Mult, +20 Chips)
Earth: Upgrades Full House (+2 Mult, +25 Chips)
Mars: Upgrades Four of a Kind (+3 Mult, +30 Chips)
Jupiter: Upgrades Flush (+2 Mult, +15 Chips)
Saturn: Upgrades Straight (+3 Mult, +30 Chips)
Uranus: Upgrades Two Pair (+1 Mult, +20 Chips)
Neptune: Upgrades Straight Flush (+4 Mult, +40 Chips)
Pluto: Upgrades High Card (+1 Mult, +10 Chips)
Planet X: Upgrades Five of a Kind (+3 Mult, +35 Chips)
Ceres: Upgrades Flush House (+4 Mult, +40 Chips)
Eris: Upgrades Flush Five (+3 Mult, +50 Chips)
Familiar: Destroy 1 random card, add 3 random Enhanced face cards
Grim: Destroy 1 random card, add 2 random Enhanced Aces
Incantation: Destroy 1 random card, add 4 random Enhanced numbered cards
Talisman: Add a Gold Seal to 1 selected card
Aura: Add Foil, Holographic, or Polychrome to 1 selected card
Wraith: Creates a random Rare Joker, sets money to $0
Sigil: Converts all cards in hand to a single random suit
Ouija: Converts all cards in hand to a single random rank, -1 hand size
Ectoplasm: Add Negative to a random Joker, -1 hand size
Immolate: Destroys 5 random cards in hand, gain $20
Ankh: Create a copy of a random Joker, destroy all other Jokers
Deja Vu: Add a Red Seal to 1 selected card
Hex: Add Polychrome to a random Joker, destroy all other Jokers
Trance: Add a Blue Seal to 1 selected card
Medium: Add a Purple Seal to 1 selected card
Cryptid: Create 2 copies of 1 selected card
The Soul: Creates a Legendary Joker
Black Hole: Upgrade every poker hand by 1 level
+4 Mult

Played Heart cards give +3 Mult when scored
Played Spade cards give +3 Mult when scored
Played Club cards give +3 Mult when scored
+8 Mult if played hand contains a Pair

All Flushes and Straights can be made with 4 cards

+30 Chips for each remaining discard

Adds one Stone card to deck when Blind is selected
X4 Mult every 6 hands played
1 in 4 chance for each played 8 to create a Tarot card
+0-23 Mult
Retrigger all played cards in final hand of the round
Adds double the rank of lowest ranked card held in hand to Mult
1 free Reroll per shop
Each played Ace, 2, 3, 5, or 8 gives +8 Mult when scored

Played face cards give +30 Chips when scored
+3 Mult for each Joker card
Earn $2 per discard if no discards are used by end of round
Retrigger each played 2, 3, 4, or 5
All cards are considered face cards

Played cards with odd rank give +31 Chips when scored

Adds times poker hand played this run to Mult

Gains $3 of sell value at end of round
When Blind selected, gain +3 Hands and lose all discards

Gains +15 Chips if played hand contains a Straight

If first hand has only 1 card, add permanent copy to deck
Every played card counts in scoring

When Blind selected, create 2 Common Jokers
Gains X0.1 Mult per scoring Enhanced card, removes Enhancement

Gains X0.25 Mult every time a playing card is added to deck
Create a Tarot card if hand played with $4 or less
Each King held in hand gives X1.5 Mult
Earn $1 for each 9 in your full deck at end of round
Earn $1 at end of round, +$2 when Boss Blind defeated
Gains X0.2 Mult per hand without playing most played hand
All played face cards become Gold cards when scored
Sell this card to disable the current Boss Blind

Add $1 sell value to every Joker and Consumable at end of round

+4 Mult for each card below deck's starting size
Each face card held has 1 in 2 chance to give $1
Earn $5 for each discarded card of specific rank
Earn extra $1 interest for every $5 at end of round

+1 Mult per Tarot card used this run

Each played card with specific suit gives X1.5 Mult

Gains X0.25 Mult for each card sold, resets on Boss Blind

Hearts/Diamonds same suit, Spades/Clubs same suit

Joker, Tarot, Planet, Spectral cards may appear multiple times

Doubles all listed probabilities

X4 Mult if played hand contains a Four of a Kind

After 2 rounds, sell to Duplicate a random Joker

Earn $1 at end of round per unique Planet card used
Each Queen held in hand gives +13 Mult
X3 Mult if you have at least 16 Enhanced cards in deck
Create a Tarot card when Blind is selected
All Planet cards and Celestial Packs in shop are free

+2 Mult for every $5 you have

Played Kings and Queens each give X2 Mult when scored
Gains X1 Mult every 23 cards discarded
Disables effect of every Boss Blind
Creates Negative copy of 1 random consumable at end of shop
Overstock: +1 card slot in shop (to 3)
Clearance Sale: All cards and packs 25% off
Hone: Foil, Holo, Polychrome appear 2X more often
Reroll Surplus: Rerolls cost $2 less
Crystal Ball: +1 consumable slot
Telescope: Celestial Packs contain Planet for most played hand
Grabber: Permanently gain +1 hand per round
Wasteful: Permanently gain +1 discard each round
Tarot Merchant: Tarot cards appear 2X more in shop
Planet Merchant: Planet cards appear 2X more in shop
Seed Money: Raise interest cap to $10
Blank: Does nothing?
Magic Trick: Playing cards can be purchased from shop
Hieroglyph: -1 Ante, -1 hand each round
Director's Cut: Reroll Boss Blind 1 time per Ante, $10
Paint Brush: +1 hand size
Overstock Plus: +1 card slot in shop (to 4)
Liquidation: All cards and packs 50% off
Glow Up: Foil, Holo, Polychrome appear 4X more often
Reroll Glut: Rerolls cost additional $2 less
Omen Globe: Spectral cards may appear in Arcana Packs
Observatory: Planet cards in consumable area give X1.5 Mult
Nacho Tong: Permanently gain additional +1 hand per round
Recyclomancy: Permanently gain additional +1 discard
Tarot Tycoon: Tarot cards appear 4X more in shop
Planet Tycoon: Planet cards appear 4X more in shop
Money Tree: Raise interest cap to $20
Antimatter: +1 Joker slot
Illusion: Playing cards in shop may have Enhancement/Edition/Seal
Petroglyph: -1 Ante again, -1 discard each round
Retcon: Reroll Boss Blind unlimited times, $10 per roll
Palette: +1 hand size again

ConsumableKey.description: Consumable card key (Tarot, Planet, or Spectral)

CardKey.description: Card key for the add endpoint. Supports jokers (j_*), consumables (c_*), vouchers (v_*), or playing cards (SUIT_RANK)
